page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Alexandra Jarvis, I am 9. l live in Lingley Drive, Wainscott. This is a record of a day in my life on Saturday 11th May 1985. I woke up at 8.30 am and switched on my light at 8.34. I read a chapter of a book called Â£The Folk of the Faraway Tree'.It is about 3 children called Jo, Bessie and Fanny and their cousin Connie who has come to stay with them but she does not believe in the people who live there like Moonface,Silky and Saucepan who is a bit deaf. Then l drank a cup of tea , my mum used P.G Tips. At 8.45 l finished my tea and digestive biscuit. I finished the chapter of my book I was reading and got up. At 9.00 l got dressed. l put on my jeans and my Popeye sweater and washed my face and hands. l used Pears soap, then l went downstairs brushed my hair.
